message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $110. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $110 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to do $105?  It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm sure you'll still make a profit.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $112. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
